name: Recipe: Braised Meatball
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Braised Meatball.

value.text: Purchase from Licai at Liuli Pavilion in Liyue Harbor

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bamboo Shoot
customize.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Braised Meatball
customize.desc: A classic Liyue dish. Fatty and lean chunks of meat are mixed with crunchy bamboo shoots before being kneaded into a ball, fried, and then boiled. The finished dish is very popular, finding a place at home meals or banquets alike.
